items.title: Frontend Development
items.description: Crafting fast, responsive, and accessible interfaces using modern libraries and frameworks.
items.moreInfo: Having experience with React, Vue, Angular, and other frameworks, I convert designs into functional, responsive, and user-friendly web applications.

items.title: Backend Development
items.description: Building robust backend systems using JavaScript frameworks like Node.js and Express.
items.moreInfo: I focus on efficient backend solutions with REST APIs, MVC architecture, and integrations with SQL and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB and PostgreSQL.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate Front-end developer with 8 years of experience mainly working with Javascript and React focusing on delivering high-quality user experiences and looking forward to contributing to a highly collaborative work environment, finding solutions and determining customer satisfaction.
